verse.name: v2
verse.lines: As little children we would dream of Christmas morn

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Of all the gifts and toys we knew we’d find

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: But we never realized a baby born one blessed night

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Gave us the greatest gift of our lives

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: We were the reason that He gave His life

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: We were the reason that He suffered and died

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: To a world that was lost He gave all He could give

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: To show us the reason to live

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: As the years went by we learned more about gifts

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
The giving of ourselves and what that means
On a dark and cloudy day a man hung crying in the rain

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: I finally found the reason for living

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: It’s in giving every part of my heart to Him

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: In all that I do every word that I say

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: I'll be giving my all just for Him, for Him

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: And we are the reason that He gave His life

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: We are the reason that He suffered and died

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: To show us the reason…to live.
